item.title: Projects
item.description:
Model Predictive Congestion Control

This project aims to investigate how to apply model predictive control theory to TCP based congestion control. Research has focused on a delay based approach using rate pacing. Some results have been presented at the 2019 Workshop on Buffer Sizing. These results and more can also be found in an arXiv paper (1).

(1): https://arxiv.org/abs/2002.09825
